```{r}
df_raw_data <- get_df_raw_data(raw_events)

```

### <strong>Timevis</strong><br/>Map: `r df_match_events %>% pull(event_properties.map_name) %>% last()`

```{r}

  get_df_tv_groups(m_killer_victim, df_match_players)
)
```

### <strong>Stats Globales</strong><br>Capture The Flag 

```{r}
readRDS("dfg.Rds") %>%
  
  arrange(-win_rate, -team_flags_balance, -match_draw) %>%
  mutate(
    rank = row_number()
  ) %>%
  select(rank, everything()) %>%
  
  rename(
    wins = match_won,
    losses = match_lost,
    draws = match_draw,
    match_played = match_played
  ) %>%
  
  formattable(list(
    # win_rate = color_tile("transparent", "lightgreen"),
    win_rate = color_tile("lightpink", "#98FB98"),
    flags_balance = left_color_bar("lightblue"),
    match_played = left_color_bar("lightblue")
  )) %>%
  
  formattable::as.datatable(
    rownames = FALSE,
    class = 'row-border hover',
    options = list(
      paging = FALSE
      ,
      columnDefs = list(list(className = 'dt-left dt-head-left', targets = "_all"))
      , scrollX = TRUE
    )
  )
```
